attributes.action: Have more religious holidays for every religion in schools and work
attributes.additional_details: everyone should have an equal amount of holiday and days off of school and work
attributes.background: make religious events a national holiday

rejection.details:
We understand you would like more religious holidays, however which holidays you mean, nor what you mean by 'an equal amount of holidays'.

You may like to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591482.
